programme.title: PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day one of the Farmers Insurance Open from Torrey Pines in San Diego, California. Scott Stallings claimed a narrow one-shot victory this time last year..(n)

programme.title: PGA Tour Classic
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2002 Players Championship which was held at TPC Sawgrass in Florida. New Zealand's Craig Perks would make history en route to claiming his first PGA Tour title..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Usain Bolt
programme.desc: A look at the career of multiple Olympic gold medallist Usain Bolt. The Jamaican has held the world and Olympic records in the 100m, 200m and 4x100m relay disciplines..(n)

programme.title: PGA Tour Classic
programme.desc: The 2003 Greater Hartford Open on the TPC at River Highlands in Connecticut. Nineteen years on from his first success in this event, Peter Jacobsen bagged the title again at the age of 49..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Heroes: Ian Woosnam
programme.desc: Former world champion snooker player Dennis Taylor interviews legendary golfer Ian Woosnam. A 29-time winner on the European Tour, Woosnam also triumphed at the 1991 Masters..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats:Nadia Comaneci
programme.desc: A look back at the career of Romania's Nadia Comaneci, a five-time Olympic gold medal-winning gymnast. She was the first woman to claim a perfect 10 score in an Olympic gymnastics event..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Babe Ruth
programme.desc: A look back on the career of legendary baseball player Babe Ruth. The American hit over 700 home runs during his career and was inducted into the National Baseball Hall of Fame in 1936..(n)
